Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Racine
ShortDescription: 79 79th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Loomis, 76th, Halsted, 79th and over regular route: due to, street blockage near 79th/Racine.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#79 79th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Loomis, 76th, Halsted, 79th and over regular route: due to, street blockage near 79th/Racine.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Westbound Reroute near Madison/Menard
ShortDescription: Westbound 20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Central, Washington and Austin: due to, fire department activity near Madison/Menard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Central, Washington and Austin: due to, fire department activity near Madison/Menard.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute near 51st/California
ShortDescription: 94 California buses temp. rerouted : due to, street blockage near 51st/California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 51st/California due to street blockage near 51st/California.

Northbound buses will operate via California, 55th and Western including the normal route streets.

Southbound buses will operate via California, 47th, Western, 55th and California.

Allow extra travel time.
